title: Global Warming Or: None Like It Hot!
description: Learn about the causes of global warming and how our handsomest politicians came up with a cheap, last-minute way to combat it once and for all.
quote: Not so fast, Sunbeam! We’re greenhouse gases. You ain’t goin’ nowhere!
altHero: a personified sunbeam wearing a hat and carrying a briefcase, chatting with the Earth
alt1: man kneels next to small girl whose ice cream cone melted onto the sidewalk
alt2: tough guy greenhouse gas stopping the sun beam
alt3: geenhouse gases laughing as trapped sunbeams heat up the Earth
alt4: spaceship dropping a giant ice cube into the ocean
